Detailed Description

This is a Netscape Portable Runtime mutex implementation.

Use NSPR thread package to make platform independent threading

Definition at line 45 of file MutexNSPR.h.

Member Function Documentation

PRLock * & sys::MutexInterface< PRLock * >::getNative (  )  [inline, inherited]

Returns the native type. You probably should not use this unless you have specific constraints on which package you use Use of this function may defeat the purpose of these classes: to provide thread implementation in an abstract interface.

const char* sys::MutexInterface< PRLock * >::getNativeType (  )  const [inline, inherited]

Return the type name. This function is essentially free, because it is static RTTI due to its template implementation

bool sys::MutexNSPR::lock (  )  [virtual]

Lock a NSPR mutex

Returns:
true only, because PR native method is void
